summary: EPIS update package cancellation status to external
description: EPIS update package cancellation status to external

query.name: packageCode
query.description: Unique package identifier generated by EPIS. Used to communicate between EPIS and external systems

query.name: reason
query.description: When failed to cancel this field may include the reason

common.name: app_key
common.description: Unique app ID issued by LAZADA Open Platform console when you apply for an app category

common.name: timestamp
common.description: The time stamp of the request e.g. 1517820392000 (which translates to 5 February 2018 08:46:32) with less than 7200s difference from UTC time

common.name: sign_method
common.description: The HMAC hash algorithm you are using to calculate your signature

request_examples.code:
client = LazopApiClient::Client.new(url, appkey, appSecret)
request = LazopApiClient::Request.new('/logistics/epis/external/packages/cancel_status_update')
request.add_api_parameter("packageCode", "FU2520082700000000000001323743212")
request.add_api_parameter("externalOrderId", "FO073511135542999")
request.add_api_parameter("success", "false")
request.add_api_parameter("reason", "Package already in delivery")
request.add_api_parameter("authorization", "Authorization")
response = client.execute(request)
puts response.success?
puts response.body

client = lazop.LazopClient(url, appkey ,appSecret)
request = lazop.LazopRequest('/logistics/epis/external/packages/cancel_status_update')
request.add_api_param('packageCode', 'FU2520082700000000000001323743212')
request.add_api_param('externalOrderId', 'FO073511135542999')
request.add_api_param('success', 'false')
request.add_api_param('reason', 'Package already in delivery')
request.add_api_param('authorization', 'Authorization')
response = client.execute(request)
print(response.type)
print(response.body)
